00023 CPixelGroup::CPixelGroup()
00024 {
00025         // default constructor
00026         m_pGroup=new TPixelGroup;
00027         m_OwnGroup=true;
00028         k_InitGroup(m_pGroup);
00029 }
00030 
00031 CPixelGroup::CPixelGroup(TPixelGroup& TGroup)
00032 {
00033         // constructor which takes an external TGroup as reference to data
00034         m_pGroup=&TGroup;
00035         m_OwnGroup=false;
00036 }
00037 
00038 CPixelGroup::CPixelGroup(unsigned int InitialSize, bool AllocateColors)
00039 {
00040         m_pGroup=new TPixelGroup;
00041         m_OwnGroup=true;
00042         k_InitGroup(m_pGroup);
00043         if (AllocateColors==true)
00044         {
00045                 k_AllocGroupAndColors(m_pGroup,InitialSize);
00046         }
00047         else
00048         {
00049                 k_AllocGroup(m_pGroup,InitialSize);
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 CPixelGroup::CPixelGroup(const CPixelGroup& SourceGroup)
00054 { 
00055         // copy constructor
00056         m_pGroup=new TPixelGroup;
00057         m_OwnGroup=true;
00058         k_InitGroup(m_pGroup);
00059         *this=SourceGroup; // use assignment operator
00060 }
00061 
00062 CPixelGroup& CPixelGroup::operator=(const CPixelGroup& SourceGroup)
00063 {
00064         // overloading of assignment operator
00065         if (this != &SourceGroup)
00066         {
00067                 // ok to do assignment
00068                 k_CopyGroup(GetTPixelGroupPtr(),SourceGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr());
00069         }
00070         else
00071         {
00072                 ostringstream ost;
00073                 ost << "CPixelGroup::operator=() Cannot assign CPixelGroup to itself" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00074                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00075         }
00076         return *this;
00077 }
00078 
00079 CPixelGroup::~CPixelGroup()
00080 {
00081         //destructor
00082         if(m_OwnGroup==true)
00083         {
00084                 k_EmptyGroup(m_pGroup);
00085                 delete m_pGroup;
00086         }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void CPixelGroup::Empty()
00090 {
00091         k_EmptyGroup(m_pGroup);
00092 }

00119 bool CPixelGroup::ColorsAvailable() const
00120 {
00121         if (m_pGroup->pColor!=NULL)
00122                 return true;
00123         else
00124                 return false;
00125 }

00143 bool CPixelGroup::InsertPosition(INT16 x, INT16 y, unsigned int Index)
00144 {
00145         bool returnValue=k_InsertPosInGroup(x,y,Index,m_pGroup);
00146         if (returnValue==false)
00147         {
00148                 ostringstream ost;
00149                 ost << "CPixelGroup::InsertPosition() Failed inserting position" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00150                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00151         }
00152         return returnValue;
00153 }
00154

00158         if (returnValue==false)

00230 bool CPixelGroup::AllocColors()
00231 {
00232         bool returnValue=k_AllocColorsGroup(m_pGroup);
00233         if (returnValue==false)
00234         {
00235                 ostringstream ost;
00236                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AllocColors() Failed allocating memory for color values or its allready allocated" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00237                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00238         }
00239         return returnValue;
00240 }

00251         return returnValue;

00254 bool CPixelGroup::AddColors(const CStdImage& Img)
00255 {
00256         bool returnValue=k_AddColorsToGroup(Img.GetConstTImagePtr(),m_pGroup);
00257         if (returnValue==false)
00258         {
00259                 ostringstream ost;
00260                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddColors() Failed adding colors" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00261                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00262         }
00263         return returnValue;
00264 }

00271 bool CPixelGroup::CopyToImage(const CPalette* pPalette, UINT32 BackGround, CStdImage& Dest)
00272 {
00273         bool returnValue;
00274         if (pPalette!=NULL)
00275                 returnValue=k_CopyGroupToImage(pPalette->GetPalettePtr(), BackGround,Dest.GetTImagePtr(),m_pGroup);
00276         else
00277                 returnValue=k_CopyGroupToImage(NULL, BackGround,Dest.GetTImagePtr(),m_pGroup);
00278 
00279         if (returnValue==false)
00280         {
00281                 ostringstream ost;
00282                 ost << "CPixelGroup::CopyToImage() Failed creating image" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00283                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00284         }
00285         return returnValue;
00286 }
00287 
00288 bool CPixelGroup::AddToImage(CStdImage& Dest,UINT32 Color)
00289 {
00290         bool ReturnValue=k_AddGroupToImage(Dest.GetTImagePtr(), m_pGroup, Color);
00291         if (ReturnValue==false)
00292         {
00293                 ostringstream ost;
00294                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddToImage() Failed adding group to image" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00295                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00296         }
00297         return ReturnValue;
00298 }
00299 
00300 bool CPixelGroup::AddToImage(CStdImage& Dest)
00301 {
00302         bool ReturnValue=k_AddGroupColorsToImage(Dest.GetTImagePtr(), m_pGroup);
00303         if (ReturnValue==false)
00304         {
00305                 ostringstream ost;
00306                 ost << "CPixelGroup::AddToImage() Failed adding group with colors to image" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00307                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00308         }
00309         return ReturnValue;
00310 }

00312 bool CPixelGroup::PosInGroup(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos,unsigned int& Index)
00313 {       
00314         T2DInt p;
00315         p.x=Pos.GetX();
00316         p.y=Pos.GetY(); 
00317         return k_PosInGroup(m_pGroup,p,&Index);
00318 }

00325         return k_PosInGroup(m_pGroup,p,&Index);
00326 }

00346 void CPixelGroup::PrintInfo(bool PrintPositions,unsigned int PosPrLine)
00347 {
00348         k_PrintGroupInfo(m_pGroup,PrintPositions,PosPrLine);

00350 
00351 ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,const CPixelGroup& Group)
00352 {
00353         s << "**************** PixelGroup info ********************\n" <<
00354                 " Positions: Top=(" << Group.m_pGroup->Top.x << "," << Group.m_pGroup->Top.y <<
00355                 ") Bottom=(" << Group.m_pGroup->Bottom.x << "," << Group.m_pGroup->Bottom.y <<
00356                 ") Left=(" << Group.m_pGroup->Left.x << "," << Group.m_pGroup->Left.y <<
00357                 ") Right=(" << Group.m_pGroup->Right.x << "," << Group.m_pGroup->Right.y << ")\n";
00358         s << " Width=" << Group.GetWidth() << " Height=" << Group.GetHeight() << endl;
00359         s << " NumberOfPixels=" << Group.m_pGroup->NumberOfPixels << " AllocatedPixels=" <<
00360                 Group.m_pGroup->AllocatedPixels << endl;
00361         return s;
00362 }
